DataElement.preferredName: Dental Implant Bone Loss Assessment Actual Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the real measurement related to the assessment of bone loss in a dental prosthesis placed permanently in tissue.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the assessment of bone loss in a dental prosthesis placed permanently in tissue.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Materials placed into (endosseous) or onto (subperiosteal) the jawbone; commonly used to support a crown, bridge, artificial tooth, stabilize a diseased tooth, or to use as anchorage in orthodontic therapy.

Concepts.definition: Materials placed into (endosseous) or onto (subperiosteal) the jawbone; commonly used to support a crown, bridge, artificial tooth, stabilize a diseased tooth, or to use as anchorage in orthodontic therapy.

Property.preferredDefinition: Connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.:Loss; a gradual decline in amount or activity.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The structural organ comprised of specialized connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.
A gradual decline in amount or activity.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the real measurement of the dental implant length.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Existing in fact; real. (from American Heritage Dictionary):Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ValueDomain.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form
